description:
*This package provides a commercial software with 15 day free trial. Pricing details are available [here](https://www.insynchq.com/pricing).*

Insync is a feature-rich client that syncs Google Drive files to and from your desktop.

## Features

* Multiple accounts
* Selective sync
* Convert Google Docs to Office or OpenDocument
* Symlink, junction and alias
* External and network drives
* Desktop interface with notifications and feed of file changes
* On-demand shared files syncing
* Revert read-only files
* Feed of file changes
* Revert read-only files
summary: Feature-rich Google Drive client for your desktop.
author: Insync
